items.title: Fernando — STSM visit
items.summary: Our Ph.D. student F. Martín Garrido is at the Italian Institute of Technology for a Short-Term Scientific Mission (STSM) to advance his research on magnetic nanomaterials.

items.title: PhD Workshop on Nanomedicine
items.summary: Organization of an PhD Workshop on Nanomedicine (UCM, Una Europa DREAM-Nano project).

items.title: Pauline — STSM visit
items.summary: We are delighted to welcome Pauline Rooms, a visiting Ph.D. researcher, to our group as part of a Short-Term Scientific Mission (STSM) within the NexMPI COST Action. Great science discussions — and a wonderful group dinner to celebrate!

items.title: DreamNano — Brainstorming meeting
items.summary: DREAM-Nano Brainstorming meeting with partners from UCD, UZH, and JU.

items.title: DreamNano — Kick-off meeting
items.summary: DREAM-Nano kick-off meeting with partners from UCD, UZH, and JU.
